question: Speed of the cylinder is accelerated by using:

answers.a: one working port, one pressure port, one exhaust port
answers.b: two working port, one pressure port, one exhaust port
answers.c: one working port, two pressure port, one exhaust port
answers.d: two working port, two pressure port, one exhaust port

answers.a: one signal receiving port, two outlet port
answers.b: two signal receiving port, one outlet port
answers.c: one signal receiving port, one outlet port
answers.d: two signal receiving port, two outlet port

answers.a: one signal receiving port, two outlet port
answers.b: one signal receiving port, one outlet port
answers.c: two signal receiving port, one outlet port
answers.d: two signal receiving port, two outlet port
